statements: SELECT * FROM GeofencedLocations
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT * FROM GeofencedLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT location_name, longitude FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE location_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM GeofencedLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC, location_id ASC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 35.5 AND 38.5 ORDER BY location_id
SELECT location_name FROM GeofencedLocations WHERE longitude BETWEEN -120 AND -110
SELECT * FROM GeofencedLocations LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM geofenced_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofenced_locations WHERE location_id = 101;
SELECT location_name FROM geofenced_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -75.0;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_access_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, permission_level FROM geofenced_locations JOIN user_access_permissions ON geofenced_locations.location_id = user_access_permissions.location_id;
SELECT * FROM geofenced_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofenced_locations WHERE latitude < 40.0000;
SELECT location_name, permission_level FROM geofenced_locations JOIN user_access_permissions ON geofenced_locations.location_id = user_access_permissions.location_id;
SELECT location_name, permission_level FROM geofenced_locations JOIN user_access_permissions ON geofenced_locations.location_id = user_access_permissions.location_id WHERE permission_level = 'ADMIN';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofenced_locations WHERE longitude > -80.0000;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, proximity_threshold FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM Permissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE proximity_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT location_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 2
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT location_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM Locations WHERE location_lat > 40
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, location_id FROM users WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_level FROM users WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, location_id FROM users WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, location_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT users.username, locations.location_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE users.permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM geofenced_locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geofenced_locations ORDER BY radius DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 'f245f652-f0c7-4c83-961f-d8a6434987df';
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY permission_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofenced_locations;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_id, radius FROM geofenced_locations WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT u.username, u.email, p.permission_level FROM users u JOIN access_permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT ua.activity_id, ua.timestamp, ua.activity_description, ul.last_known_location_id FROM user_activity ua LEFT JOIN user_location ul ON ua.user_id = ul.user_id;
